gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 127, Lakers 125
gameRecap.excerpt: Luka Doncic (33 points, 17 assists) and Tim Hardaway Jr. (32 points, five 3PM) combine for 65 points to lead the Mavericks over the Lakers, 127-125.  Dante Exum added 26 points (17 in the 4th)  and seven 3PM in the victory.  Anthony Davis tallied 37 points and 11 rebounds for the Lakers, while LeBron James added 33 points, eight rebounds and nine assists in the losing effort.  The Mavericks improve to 15-8 on the season, while the Lakers fall to 14-10.
